attributes.action: Investigate why BP keep increasing fuel prices when the price of oil is now stable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government to investigate why BP in particular along with likes of Texaco, Q8 and a few other petroleum companies keep increasing the cost of fuel on a weekly basis, this is way above the chancellors rise in the budget, oil prices have dropped, yet these companies are being totally greedy and charging fuel at an unacceptable level now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
